TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {30308=2011: Played 10 games in the defensive backfield as a sophomore…Led the team with nine pass break-ups last season and was third with two interceptions…Had 28 solo tackles, which ties for fourth most on the team…Assisted on 13 other tackles to total 41 on the season…Also, forced a fumble…Had season-highs with eight solo and 10 total tackles at UMass on October 8…Was named NEC Defensive Player of the Week after recording four tackles and an interception against James Madison, September 10., 29954=2012: Started all 10 games at corner back for the Blue Devil defense…Totaled 27 tackles, including 15 solo stops…Had two interceptions and a team-high 10 pass break ups…Also blocked a pair of extra point attempts, including one that he returned 98 yards for an extra point score against Saint Francis U on October 27., 197552=CCSU DEPARTMENT OF ATHLETICS 1615 STANLEY STREET NEW BRITAIN, CT 06050 (860) 832-BLUE}
